tika-abh08t20:4: 1306. Ayaṃ sikhāpattā vipassanā eva saccānulomañāṇaṃ nāma pavuccati.
tika-abh08t20:6: 1314-6.Bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ, uddhañca anulomatoti uddhaṃ vattamānānaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ anulomato, idaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pariyosānaṃ nāma bhāsitaṃ mahesinā kathitaṃ. Saccānulomañāṇaṃ āhacca uppannā, sabbappakārena gotrabhupariyosānaṃ.
